faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our pricing and features.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access to premium features until the end of your billing period.

questions.question: What happens when I reach my document limit on the free plan?
questions.answer: Once you've created 3 documents in a month on the free plan, you'll need to wait until the next month or upgrade to a paid plan to create more.

questions.question: Can I switch between plans?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all new subscriptions. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact our support team for a full refund.
